name: Mina Ryad
summary: Results-oriented C++ Software Engineer with extensive experience in embedded systems and automotive software engineering. Proven track record in delivering high-quality software components, with strong expertise in C++, AUTOSAR, and Agile methodologies.

experience.title: C++ Software Engineer
achievements: Developed and tested VAL software components for Volkswagen Infotainment's connectivity ECU, improving system efficiency by 15%.
Executed software V-cycle deliverables across multiple platforms, ensuring compliance with Automotive SPICE standards.
Implemented Agile/Scrum methodologies, enhancing team productivity by 20%.

experience.title: Embedded Software Engineer
achievements: Enhanced system efficiency and reliability for the Queueing System Project, reducing processing time by 10%.

experience.title: Project Engineer
achievements: Managed multiple HDD sites within government mega projects, ensuring on-time project delivery.
Led a successful soil freezing project at the metro tunnel, recognized as a major company achievement.

experience.title: Maintenance and Production Engineer
achievements: Optimized production plans, increasing productivity across three lines by 12%.
Improved daily maintenance operations, enhancing equipment uptime and worker safety.

education: Bachelor’s Degree in Mechatronics and Robotics Engineering, Assiut University (2016)
Embedded Systems Diploma, National Telecommunication Institute (Oct 2021 – Mar 2022)
skills: Proficient in C/C++ and Python for software development and automation.
Strong knowledge of socket communication, multithreading, and IPC.
Experience with Google Protocol Buffers, Git, and real-time operating systems.
Familiar with AUTOSAR architecture, data structures, and algorithms.
certifications: AI and Data Science Introduction (Aug 2020 – Jan 2021)
projects: System Monitor Project - Udacity C++ Nanodegree
IOT Smart Home Project - ARM Cortex M4
interests: Volunteering as a Scout Leader, fostering leadership and teamwork.
Passionate about historical documentaries and technological advancements.
